dependencies: Kubernetes API resources apps/v1 Deployment and v1 Service (./deployment.yaml, ./service.yaml, ./manifests/app-deploy.yaml, ./manifests/app-svc.yaml)

GitHub Actions: docker/build-push-action, docker/setup-buildx-action, docker/login-action, docker/metadata-action, sigstore/cosign-installer, actions/deploy-pages, actions/upload-pages-artifact (./.github/workflows/docker-publish.yml, ./.github/workflows/static.yml)
Jenkins tooling referenced: jdk17, node16, sonar-scanner, kubectl, terraform, trivy, OWASP dependency-check, docker-scout, zap-cli; integrations: SonarQube, Jira, email (./Jenkinsfile)
architectural_resources: Static web application (Notes App) served by Nginx container
Container image registry (Docker Hub image referenced: yash5090/notes-webapp:latest; GitHub Container Registry publishing workflow: ghcr.io)
Kubernetes cluster resources: Deployment (replicas=2) and Service type LoadBalancer (exposes port 5000 -> pod 5000)
External load balancer (implied by Service type LoadBalancer; AWS-specific annotations present in ./service.yaml for ALB)
CI/CD systems: GitHub Actions workflows and Jenkins pipeline
Code quality/security tooling resources: SonarQube, OWASP Dependency-Check, Trivy, Docker Scout, OWASP ZAP (as pipeline steps)
Potential AWS infrastructure dependency (implied by aws CLI usage in Jenkinsfile and AWS LB annotations in service.yaml)
